title: Reward for levels
body:
Hi
I just wanna ask which is new rewards for leveling?
In the past it was 400 rp, how it works now ?
What i get and etc?.. I was looking for it but everywhere is garona only. {{champion:43}}

replies.body: Instead of getting a free 400 RP for reaching a certain level, you now get a new premium hextech chest!
